name: Home Visit
description: Feeding, playful and affectionate time, taking in the mail & newspapers, lights on & off, & watering plants, administering medications if needed.

name: Dog Walk
description: Neighborhood walking, mail/newspaper collection, and water refreshing.

name: Dog Walks & Home Visit
description: Combine a home visit and dog walk and get a deal!

name: Dog Park Visits
description: Includes transportation within 5 miles and supervision at the park.

name: Overnight Stays
description: Encompasses home visit services plus dog walks as requested.
